TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit Registry extends System.Object
public ref class Registry abstract sealed

summary.span: Provides objects that represent the root keys in the Windows registry, and methods to access key/value pairs.

span.span: Provides objects that represent the root keys in the Windows registry, and methods to access key/value pairs.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类提供的一套标准的根项在运行 Windows 的计算机上的注册表中找到。This class provides the set of standard root keys found in the registry on machines running Windows. 注册表是有关应用程序、 用户和默认系统设置信息的存储功能。The registry is a storage facility for information about applications, users, and default system settings. 例如，应用程序可以使用注册表来存储需要后关闭应用程序时，保留的信息，并在重新加载应用程序时访问该相同信息。For example, applications can use the registry for storing information that needs to be preserved after the application is closed, and access that same information when the application is reloaded. 例如，你可以存储颜色首选项、 的屏幕位置或窗口的大小。For instance, you can store color preferences, screen locations, or the size of the window. 你可以通过将信息存储在注册表中的其他位置来控制此数据用于每个用户。You can control this data for each user by storing the information in a different location in the registry. 基或根实例公开的`Registry`类描述子项和注册表中的值的基本存储机制。The base, or root instances that are exposed by the `Registry` class delineate the basic storage mechanism for subkeys and values in the registry. 所有项都是只读的因为注册表依赖于它们存在。All keys are read-only because the registry depends on their existence. 通过公开的键`Registry`是：The keys exposed by `Registry` are: 存储有关用户首选项的信息。Stores information about user preferences. 存储为本地计算机的配置信息。Stores configuration information for the local machine. 存储有关类型 （类） 的信息和它们的属性。Stores information about types (and classes) and their properties. 存储有关默认用户配置的信息。Stores information about the default user configuration. 将存储软件组件的性能的信息。Stores performance information for software components. 存储非特定于用户的硬件信息。Stores non-user-specific hardware information. 将动态数据存储。Stores dynamic data. 一旦你确定要在其下存储/检索注册表中的信息的根密钥，你可以使用类来添加或删除子项，和操作给定键的值。Once you have identified the root key under which you want to store/retrieve information from the registry, you can use the class to add or remove subkeys, and manipulate the values for a given key. 硬件设备可以将信息放在使用自动插接口注册表中。Hardware devices can place information in the registry automatically using the Plug and Play interface. 安装设备驱动程序软件可以通过写入标准 Api 在注册表中放置信息。Software for installing device drivers can place information in the registry by writing to standard APIs. ## 用于获取和设置值的静态方法Static Methods for Getting and Setting Values 在.NET Framework 2.0 版中，类还包含`static`和方法以设置，并从注册表项中检索值。In the .NET Framework version 2.0, the class also contains `static` and methods for setting and retrieving values from registry keys. 这些方法都将打开和关闭注册表项的每个其进行使用，因此它们不会执行的时间以及在类似方法类，当你访问大量的值。These methods open and close registry keys each time they are used, so they do not perform as well as analogous methods in the class, when you access a large number of values. 类还提供了让你可以设置注册表项，以进行检索之前，测试值的数据类型并删除项的 Windows 访问控制安全性的方法。The class also provides methods that allow you to set Windows access control security for registry keys, to test the data type of a value before retrieving it, and to delete keys. ## Examples 本部分包含两个代码示例。This section contains two code examples. 第一个示例演示根项，第二个示例演示`static`和方法。The first example demonstrates root keys, and the second example demonstrates the `static` and methods. 示例 1Example 1 下面的代码示例演示如何检索 HKEY_USERS 项中的子项和打印到屏幕其名称。The following code example demonstrates how to retrieve the subkeys of the HKEY_USERS key, and print their names to the screen. 使用方法来创建感兴趣的特定子项的实例。Use the method to create an instance of the particular subkey of interest. 然后，可以使用中的其他操作`RegistryKey`来操作该注册表项。You can then use other operations in `RegistryKey` to manipulate that key. [!code-cpp[Classic Registry.Users Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Registry.Users Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic Registry.Users Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Registry.Users Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Registry.Users Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Registry.Users Example/VB/source.vb#1)] 示例 2Example 2 下面的代码示例将多个数据类型的值存储在一个示例键中创建密钥，这样做了，以及然后检索和显示的值。The following code example stores values of several data types in an example key, creating the key as it does so, and then retrieves and displays the values. 示例演示了存储和检索默认 （无名称） 的名称/值对，以及如何使用`defaultValue`名称/值对不存在时。The example demonstrates storing and retrieving the default (nameless) name/value pair, and the use of `defaultValue` when a name/value pair does not exist. [!code-cpp[Microsoft.Win32.Registry.GetSet#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Microsoft.Win32.Registry.GetSet/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Microsoft.Win32.Registry.GetSet#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Microsoft.Win32.Registry.GetSet/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Microsoft.Win32.Registry.GetSet#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Microsoft.Win32.Registry.GetSet/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: This field reads the Windows registry base key HKEY_CLASSES_ROOT.

span.span: This field reads the Windows registry base key HKEY_CLASSES_ROOT.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 常规应用程序和 OLE 应用程序使用此项下存储的数据。Both conventional applications and OLE applications use data that is stored under this key. 此密钥还通过将存储 DDE 和 OLE 的支持信息提供向后的兼容性 Windows 3.1 注册数据库。This key also provides backward compatibility with the Windows 3.1 registration database by storing information for DDE and OLE support. 文件查看器和用户界面扩展将其 OLE 类标识符存储在此密钥，并在此注册表项注册处理服务器。File viewers and user interface extensions store their OLE class identifiers in this key, and processing servers are registered in this key. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何检索此项的子项，并输出到屏幕其名称。The following example demonstrates how to retrieve the subkeys of this key, and prints their names to the screen. 使用方法来创建感兴趣的特定子项的实例。Use the method to create an instance of the particular subkey of interest. 然后，可以使用中的其他操作来操作该注册表项。You can then use other operations in to manipulate that key. [!code-cpp[Classic Registry.ClassesRoot Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Registry.ClassesRoot Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic Registry.ClassesRoot Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Registry.ClassesRoot Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Registry.ClassesRoot Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Registry.ClassesRoot Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: This field reads the Windows registry base key HKEY_CURRENT_CONFIG.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此成员映射到中的子项。This member is mapped to a subkey within . 使用此成员的示例是存储不同的服务器名称，具体取决于是否系统连接到网络其数据的应用程序。An example of using this member is an application that stores a different server name for its data depending on whether the system is attached to a network. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何检索此项的子项，并输出到屏幕其名称。The following example demonstrates how to retrieve the subkeys of this key, and prints their names to the screen. 使用方法来创建感兴趣的特定子项的实例。Use the method to create an instance of the particular subkey of interest. 然后，可以使用中的其他操作来操作该注册表项。You can then use other operations in to manipulate that key. [!code-cpp[Classic Registry.CurrentConfig Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Registry.CurrentConfig Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic Registry.CurrentConfig Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Registry.CurrentConfig Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Registry.CurrentConfig Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Registry.CurrentConfig Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: Contains information about the current user preferences.

span.span: Contains information about the current user preferences.

summary.span: This field reads the Windows registry base key HKEY_CURRENT_USER

span.span: This field reads the Windows registry base key HKEY_CURRENT_USER

remarks.format: ## Remarks 存储在此项的信息包括的环境变量和关于程序组、 颜色、 打印机、 网络连接和应用程序首选项的数据的设置。Information stored in this key includes the settings of environment variables and data about program groups, colors, printers, network connections, and application preferences. 此密钥，使得易于建立当前用户的设置。This key makes it easier to establish the current user's settings. 此密钥，在软件供应商存储的当前的特定于用户的首选项，要在其应用程序中使用。In this key, software vendors store the current user-specific preferences to be used within their applications. Microsoft，例如，创建要用于每个应用程序创建其自己的 Microsoft 密钥下的子项及其应用程序 HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Microsoft 项。Microsoft, for example, creates the HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Microsoft key for its applications to use, with each application creating its own subkey under the Microsoft key. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何检索此项的子项，并输出到屏幕其名称。The following example demonstrates how to retrieve the subkeys of this key, and prints their names to the screen. 使用方法来创建感兴趣的特定子项的实例。Use the method to create an instance of the particular subkey of interest. 然后，可以使用中的其他操作来操作该注册表项。You can then use other operations in to manipulate that key. [!code-cpp[Classic Registry.CurrentUser Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Registry.CurrentUser Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic Registry.CurrentUser Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Registry.CurrentUser Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Registry.CurrentUser Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Registry.CurrentUser Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: Contains dynamic registry data.

span.span: Contains dynamic registry data.

summary.span: This field reads the Windows registry base key HKEY_DYN_DATA.

span.span: This field reads the Windows registry base key HKEY_DYN_DATA.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Windows 98/Windows Me 注册表支持静态数据 （这存储在注册表中的磁盘） 和动态数据 （这会更改通常情况下，例如性能统计信息）。The Windows 98/Windows Me registry supports both static data (which is stored on disk in the registry) and dynamic data (which changes frequently, such as performance statistics). 此动态数据区域是可以远程和本地运行的 Win32 应用程序允许虚拟设备驱动程序 (VxDs) 提供实时数据的机制。This dynamic data area is the mechanism that allows Virtual Device Drivers (VxDs) to provide real-time data to Win32 applications that can run remotely as well as locally. 它还允许系统监视器在远程 Windows 98/Windows Me 系统上提供性能统计信息。It also allows the system monitor to provide performance statistics on remote Windows 98/Windows Me systems. VxDs 并不仅限于性能数据。VxDs are not limited to performance data. 它们可以提供他们想要将传递从 0 循环到最低的 3 环高效而不独占 CPU 任何的数据。They can provide any data they want to pass from Ring 0 to Ring 3 efficiently without monopolizing the CPU. 注册表支持通过将存储指向返回一个值 （或多个值） 的函数的动态数据。The registry supports dynamic data by storing a pointer to a function that returns a value (or many values). 当注册表调用查询值与键相关联动态，调用函数以返回所需的值。When a Registry call queries values associated with a dynamic key, that function is called to return the desired value or values. > [!NOTE] > 动态密钥引入了在 Microsoft Windows 95 中以处理动态注册表数据。Dynamic keys were introduced in Microsoft Windows 95 to handle dynamic Registry data. 支持仅在 Windows 98/Windows me。They are supported only in Windows 98/Windows Me. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何检索此项的子项，并输出到屏幕其名称。The following example demonstrates how to retrieve the subkeys of this key, and prints their names to the screen. 使用方法来创建感兴趣的特定子项的实例。Use the method to create an instance of the particular subkey of interest. 然后，可以使用中的其他操作来操作该注册表项。You can then use other operations in to manipulate that key. 请注意，此示例可能不返回任何结果，因为可能没有可用的动态数据，或者你可能未运行 Windows 98 / me。Note that this example can return no results, since there might not be dynamic data available, or you might not be running Windows 98/ME. 在其他系统上，使用此密钥可能会导致错误。Using this key may cause an error on other systems. [!code-cpp[Classic Registry.DynData Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Registry.DynData Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic Registry.DynData Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Registry.DynData Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Registry.DynData Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Registry.DynData Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

exception.span: The operating system does not support dynamic data; that is, it is not Windows 98, Windows 98 Second Edition, or Windows Millennium Edition (Windows Me).

span.span: The operating system does not support dynamic data; that is, it is not Windows 98, Windows 98 Second Edition, or Windows Millennium Edition (Windows Me).

summary.span: Retrieves the value associated with the specified name, in the specified registry key.

span.span: Retrieves the value associated with the specified name, in the specified registry key.

summary.span: If the name is not found in the specified key, returns a default value that you provide, or if the specified key does not exist.

span.span: If the name is not found in the specified key, returns a default value that you provide, or if the specified key does not exist.

returns.span: if the subkey specified by does not exist; otherwise, the value associated with , or if is not found.

span.span: if the subkey specified by does not exist; otherwise, the value associated with , or if is not found.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 字符串`valueName`不区分大小写。The string `valueName` is not case-sensitive. > [!NOTE] > 注册表项可以包含一个值，与任何名称都不关联。A registry key can contain one value that is not associated with any name. 在注册表编辑器中显示了此未命名的值，而不是名称将显示字符串"（默认值）"。When this unnamed value is displayed in the registry editor, the string "(Default)" appears instead of a name. 若要检索此未命名的值，指定`null`或为空字符串 ("") 为`valuName`。To retrieve this unnamed value, specify either `null` or the empty string ("") for `valuName`. 有效的根名称是 HKEY_CURRENT_USER、 HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE、 注册表、 HKEY_USERS、 HKEY_PERFORMANCE_DATA、 HKEY_CURRENT_CONFIG 和 HKEY_DYN_DATA。Valid root names are HKEY_CURRENT_USER, HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE, HKEY_CLASSES_ROOT, HKEY_USERS, HKEY_PERFORMANCE_DATA, HKEY_CURRENT_CONFIG, and HKEY_DYN_DATA. 例如，在 Visual Basic 中的字符串"HKEY_CURRENT_USER\MyTestKey"访问 HKEY_CURRENT_USER 根目录中的子项"MyTestKey"的键/值对。For example, in Visual Basic the string "HKEY_CURRENT_USER\MyTestKey" accesses key/value pairs for the subkey "MyTestKey" in the HKEY_CURRENT_USER root. 当方法检索可扩展字符串值 ()，它就会展开环境字符串使用本地环境中的数据。When the method retrieves expandable string values (), it expands environment strings using data from the local environment. 如果包含对环境变量的可展开引用的值已存储为 string ()，而不是可扩展字符串 ()，不展开它。If a value containing expandable references to environment variables has been stored as a string (), rather than as an expandable string (), does not expand it. 已检索到它通过调用后，你可以展开此类字符串方法。You can expand such a string after it has been retrieved by calling the method. > [!NOTE] > 从 HKEY_PERFORMANCE_DATA 中检索数据的建议的方法是使用类而不是方法。The recommended way to retrieve data from HKEY_PERFORMANCE_DATA is to use the class rather than the method. 和方法打开和关闭注册表项的方法以及其进行使用，因此它们不会执行每次类如果访问大量的值。The and methods open and close registry keys each time they are used, so they do not perform as well as the methods of the class if you access a large number of values. 此外提供了可用于将访问控制列表 (ACL) 添加到注册表项，以进行检索之前，测试值的数据类型并删除密钥的方法。 also provides methods that allow you to add an access control list (ACL) to a registry key, to test the data type of a value before retrieving it, and to delete keys. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将多个数据类型的值存储在一个示例键中创建密钥，这样做了，以及然后检索和显示的值。The following code example stores values of several data types in an example key, creating the key as it does so, and then retrieves and displays the values. 示例演示了存储和检索默认 （无名称） 的名称/值对，以及如何使用`defaultValue`名称/值对不存在时。The example demonstrates storing and retrieving the default (nameless) name/value pair, and the use of `defaultValue` when a name/value pair does not exist. [!code-cpp[Microsoft.Win32.Registry.GetSet#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Microsoft.Win32.Registry.GetSet/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Microsoft.Win32.Registry.GetSet#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Microsoft.Win32.Registry.GetSet/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Microsoft.Win32.Registry.GetSet#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Microsoft.Win32.Registry.GetSet/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: Contains the configuration data for the local machine.

span.span: Contains the configuration data for the local machine.

summary.span: This field reads the Windows registry base key HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE.

span.span: This field reads the Windows registry base key HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `LocalMachine` 包含五个密钥：`LocalMachine` contains five keys: 硬件Hardware 描述计算机中的物理硬件设备驱动程序使用该硬件，和映射和链接，用户模式代码的内核模式驱动程序的相关的数据的方式。Describes the physical hardware in the computer, the way device drivers use that hardware, and mappings and related data that link kernel-mode drivers with user-mode code. 此密钥中的所有数据进行重新都创建每次启动系统。All data in this key is recreated each time the system is started. 说明子项描述的实际计算机硬件。The Description subkey describes the actual computer hardware. DeviceMap 子项包含特定于特定类的驱动程序的格式的其他数据。The DeviceMap subkey contains miscellaneous data in formats specific to particular classes of drivers. ResourceMap 子项描述哪些设备驱动程序声明哪些硬件资源。The ResourceMap subkey describes which device drivers claim which hardware resources. Windows NT 诊断程序 (Winmsdp.exe) 可以报告其内容以易于理解的形式。The Windows NT Diagnostics program (Winmsdp.exe) can report on its contents in an easy-to-read form. SAMSAM 目录服务数据库的用户和组帐户，以及在 Windows 2000 Server 域的安全信息 （SAM 是安全帐户管理器，称为目录服务数据库）。The directory services database of security information for user and group accounts, and for the domains in Windows 2000 Server (SAM is the Security Account Manager, known as the directory services database). 安全性Security 包含本地安全策略，例如，特定的用户权限。Contains the local security policy, such as specific user rights. 只能由 Windows 2000 安全子系统使用此密钥。This key is used only by the Windows 2000 security subsystem. 软件Software 每台计算机软件数据库。The per-computer software database. 此项包含有关与各种项的其他配置数据一起在本地计算机上安装软件的数据。This key contains data about software installed on the local computer, along with various items of miscellaneous configuration data. 系统System 控制系统启动、 设备驱动程序加载、 Windows 2000 服务和操作系统的行为。Controls system startup, device driver loading, Windows 2000 services, and operating system behavior. 按照约定，如果在存在相似的数据并在列表视图中的数据优先。By convention, if similar data exists under and under , the data in takes precedence. 但是，在此注册表项的值可以还扩展 （而不是替换） Registry.LocalMachine 中的数据。However, values in this key can also extend (rather than replace) data in Registry.LocalMachine. 此外，某些项 （例如加载项的设备驱动程序） 将毫无意义，如果它们在 Registry.LocalMachine 外部发生。Also, some items (such as device driver loading entries) are meaningless if they occur outside of Registry.LocalMachine. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何检索此项的子项，并输出到屏幕其名称。The following example demonstrates how to retrieve the subkeys of this key, and prints their names to the screen. 使用方法来创建感兴趣的特定子项的实例。Use the method to create an instance of the particular subkey of interest. 然后，可以使用中的其他操作来操作该注册表项。You can then use other operations in to manipulate that key. [!code-cpp[Classic Registry.LocalMachine Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Registry.LocalMachine Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic Registry.LocalMachine Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Registry.LocalMachine Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Registry.LocalMachine Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Registry.LocalMachine Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public static readonly Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey PerformanceData;
.field public static initonly class Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey PerformanceData
Public Shared ReadOnly PerformanceData As RegistryKey
public: static initonly Microsoft::Win32::RegistryKey ^ PerformanceData;
staticval mutable PerformanceData : Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey

summary.span: Contains performance information for software components.

span.span: Contains performance information for software components.

summary.span: This field reads the Windows registry base key HKEY_PERFORMANCE_DATA.

span.span: This field reads the Windows registry base key HKEY_PERFORMANCE_DATA.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每个软件组件会创建其对象，它在已安装，并执行时将计数器数据时的计数器的键。Each software component creates keys for its objects, counters when it is installed, and writes counter data while it is executing. 你可以访问此数据，如像访问任何其他注册表数据，使用函数。You can access this data as you would access any other registry data, using the functions. 尽管你使用注册表收集性能数据，数据不存储在注册表数据库。Although you use the registry to collect performance data, the data is not stored in the registry database. 相反，使用此密钥访问注册表会导致系统从相应的系统对象管理器收集的数据。Instead, accessing the registry with this key causes the system to collect the data from the appropriate system object managers. 若要从本地系统中获取性能数据，请使用方法，与 Registry.PerformanceData 键。To obtain performance data from the local system, use the method, with the Registry.PerformanceData key. 第一次调用将打开 （您不必显式第一次打开此项） 的密钥。The first call opens the key (you do not need to explicitly open the key first). 但是，请务必使用方法来关闭项的句柄，在完成后获得性能数据。However, be sure to use the method to close the handle to the key when you are finished obtaining performance data. 用户无法安装或删除的软件组件，在使用其性能数据时。The user cannot install or remove a software component while its performance data is in use. 若要从远程系统获取性能数据，必须使用方法，与远程系统和 Registry.PerformanceData 密钥的计算机名称。To obtain performance data from a remote system, you must use the method, with the computer name of the remote system and the Registry.PerformanceData key. 此呼叫会检索表示远程系统的性能数据的密钥。This call retrieves a key representing the performance data for the remote system. 若要检索的数据，调用使用此密钥，而不是 Registry.PerformanceData 密钥。To retrieve the data, call using this key, rather than the Registry.PerformanceData key. > [!NOTE] > 在 Windows Server 2003，用户必须至少属于性能监视器用户组才能访问此基项的子项。On Windows Server 2003, a user must at least belong to the Performance Monitor Users group in order to access subkeys of this base key. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何检索此项的子项，并输出到屏幕其名称。The following example demonstrates how to retrieve the subkeys of this key, and prints their names to the screen. 使用方法来创建感兴趣的特定子项的实例。Use the method to create an instance of the particular subkey of interest. 然后，可以使用中的其他操作来操作该注册表项。You can then use other operations in to manipulate that key. 请注意，此示例可以通常会返回任何结果，因为可能有无性能数据。Note that this example can often return no results, since there might be no performance data. [!code-cpp[Classic Registry.PerformanceData Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Registry.PerformanceData Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic Registry.PerformanceData Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Registry.PerformanceData Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Registry.PerformanceData Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Registry.PerformanceData Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: Sets the value of a name/value pair in a registry key.

span.span: Sets the value of a name/value pair in a registry key.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例将多个数据类型的值存储在一个示例键中创建密钥，这样做了，以及然后检索和显示的值。The following code example stores values of several data types in an example key, creating the key as it does so, and then retrieves and displays the values. 示例演示了存储和检索默认 （无名称） 的名称/值对，以及如何使用`defaultValue`名称/值对不存在时。The example demonstrates storing and retrieving the default (nameless) name/value pair, and the use of `defaultValue` when a name/value pair does not exist. [!code-cpp[Microsoft.Win32.Registry.GetSet#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Microsoft.Win32.Registry.GetSet/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Microsoft.Win32.Registry.GetSet#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Microsoft.Win32.Registry.GetSet/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Microsoft.Win32.Registry.GetSet#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Microsoft.Win32.Registry.GetSet/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public static void SetValue (string keyName, string valueName, object value);
.method public static hidebysig void SetValue(string keyName, string valueName, object value) cil managed
Public Shared Sub SetValue (keyName As String, valueName As String, value As Object)
public: static void SetValue(System::String ^ keyName, System::String ^ valueName, System::Object ^ value);
static member SetValue : string * string * obj -> unit

param.name: keyName
param.span: The full registry path of the key, beginning with a valid registry root, such as "HKEY_CURRENT_USER".

span.span: The full registry path of the key, beginning with a valid registry root, such as "HKEY_CURRENT_USER".

param.name: valueName
param.span: The name of the name/value pair.

span.span: The name of the name/value pair.
The value to be stored.

summary.span: Sets the specified name/value pair on the specified registry key.

span.span: Sets the specified name/value pair on the specified registry key.

summary.span: If the specified key does not exist, it is created.

span.span: If the specified key does not exist, it is created.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 从开始[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]、`valueName`参数不再限制为最多为 255 个字符; 但是，`keyName`参数继续具有 255 个字符限制。Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], the `valueName` parameter is no longer restricted to a maximum of 255 characters; however, the `keyName` parameter continues to have the 255-character restriction. 由于多个值可以存储在注册表中的每个项，你必须使用`valueName`参数来指定你想要设置的特定值。Because many values can be stored in each key in the registry, you must use the `valueName` parameter to specify the particular value you want to set. > [!NOTE] > 注册表项可以包含一个值，与任何名称都不关联。A registry key can contain one value that is not associated with any name. 在注册表编辑器中显示了此未命名的值，而不是名称将显示字符串"（默认值）"。When this unnamed value is displayed in the registry editor, the string "(Default)" appears instead of a name. 若要设置此未命名的值，指定`null`或为空字符串 ("") 为`valueName`。To set this unnamed value, specify either `null` or the empty string ("") for `valueName`. 如果`valueName`不存在的项中创建和关联的值设置为`value`。If `valueName` does not exist in the key, it is created and the associated value is set to `value`. 如果`keyName`指定不存在，一个子项指定的根目录中创建的子项。If `keyName` specifies a subkey that does not exist, the subkey is created in the specified root. 例如，在 Visual Basic 中的字符串"HKEY_CURRENT_USER\MyTestKey"创建 HKEY_CURRENT_USER 根目录中的子项"MyTestKey"。For example, in Visual Basic the string "HKEY_CURRENT_USER\MyTestKey" creates the subkey "MyTestKey" in the HKEY_CURRENT_USER root. 字符串"HKEY_CURRENT_USER\MyTestKey\Key2\Key3"创建"MyTestKey"、"MyTestKey\Key2"和"MyTestKey\Key2\Key3"的嵌套的子项。The string "HKEY_CURRENT_USER\MyTestKey\Key2\Key3" creates the nested subkeys "MyTestKey", "MyTestKey\Key2", and "MyTestKey\Key2\Key3". 有效的根名称包含 HKEY_CURRENT_USER、 HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE、 注册表、 HKEY_USERS、 HKEY_PERFORMANCE_DATA、 HKEY_CURRENT_CONFIG 和 HKEY_DYN_DATA。Valid root names include HKEY_CURRENT_USER, HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE, HKEY_CLASSES_ROOT, HKEY_USERS, HKEY_PERFORMANCE_DATA, HKEY_CURRENT_CONFIG, and HKEY_DYN_DATA. > [!NOTE] > 方法打开注册表项、 设置的值，并关闭每次调用时的密钥。The method opens a registry key, sets the value, and closes the key each time it is called. 如果你需要修改大量的值，方法可能会提供更好的性能。If you need to modify a large number of values, the method might provide better performance. 类还提供了可用于将访问控制列表 (ACL) 添加到注册表项，以进行检索之前，测试值的数据类型并删除密钥的方法。The class also provides methods that allow you to add an access control list (ACL) to a registry key, to test the data type of a value before retrieving it, and to delete keys. 此重载将 64 位整数存储为字符串 ()。This overload of stores 64-bit integers as strings (). 若要将作为 64 位数字存储值，请使用方法重载。To store 64-bit numbers as values, use the method overload. 此重载存储所有的字符串值作为对象，即使它们包含对环境变量的可展开引用。This overload of stores all string values as objects, even if they contain expandable references to environment variables. 若要保存为可展开的字符串的字符串值 ()，使用方法重载。To save string values as expandable strings (), use the method overload. 此重载是等效于调用方法重载。This overload is equivalent to calling the method overload with . > [!NOTE] > 在 Windows 98 和 Windows Millennium Edition (Windows Me)，注册表不是 Unicode，并不是所有 Unicode 字符都是有效的所有代码页。On Windows 98 and Windows Millennium Edition (Windows Me), the registry is not Unicode, and not all Unicode characters are valid for all code pages. 对于当前的代码页无效的 Unicode 字符都替换为最佳的匹配项。A Unicode character that is invalid for the current code page is replaced by the best available match. 不引发异常。No exception is thrown. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将多个数据类型的值存储在一个示例键中创建密钥，这样做了，以及然后检索和显示的值。The following code example stores values of several data types in an example key, creating the key as it does so, and then retrieves and displays the values. 示例演示了存储和检索默认 （无名称） 的名称/值对，以及如何使用`defaultValue`名称/值对不存在时。The example demonstrates storing and retrieving the default (nameless) name/value pair, and the use of `defaultValue` when a name/value pair does not exist. [!code-cpp[Microsoft.Win32.Registry.GetSet#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Microsoft.Win32.Registry.GetSet/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Microsoft.Win32.Registry.GetSet#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Microsoft.Win32.Registry.GetSet/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Microsoft.Win32.Registry.GetSet#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Microsoft.Win32.Registry.GetSet/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 从开始[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]、`valueName`参数不再限制为最多为 255 个字符; 但是，`keyName`参数将继续具有 255 个字符限制。Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], the `valueName` parameter is no longer restricted to a maximum of 255 characters; however, the `keyName` parameter continues have the 255-character restriction. 由于多个值可以存储在注册表中的每个项，你必须使用`valueName`参数来指定你想要设置的特定值。Because many values can be stored in each key in the registry, you must use the `valueName` parameter to specify the particular value you want to set. > [!NOTE] > 注册表项可以包含一个值，与任何名称都不关联。A registry key can contain one value that is not associated with any name. 在注册表编辑器中显示了此未命名的值，而不是名称将显示字符串"（默认值）"。When this unnamed value is displayed in the registry editor, the string "(Default)" appears instead of a name. 若要设置此未命名的值，指定`null`或为空字符串 ("") 为`valueName`。To set this unnamed value, specify either `null` or the empty string ("") for `valueName`. 如果`valueName`不存在的项中创建和关联的值设置为`value`。If `valueName` does not exist in the key, it is created and the associated value is set to `value`. 如果`keyName`指定不存在，一个子项指定的根目录中创建的子项。If `keyName` specifies a subkey that does not exist, the subkey is created in the specified root. 例如，在 Visual Basic 中的字符串"HKEY_CURRENT_USER\MyTestKey"创建 HKEY_CURRENT_USER 根目录中的子项"MyTestKey"。For example, in Visual Basic the string "HKEY_CURRENT_USER\MyTestKey" creates the subkey "MyTestKey" in the HKEY_CURRENT_USER root. 字符串"HKEY_CURRENT_USER\MyTestKey\Key2\Key3"创建"MyTestKey"、"MyTestKey\Key2"和"MyTestKey\Key2\Key3"的嵌套的子项。The string "HKEY_CURRENT_USER\MyTestKey\Key2\Key3" creates the nested subkeys "MyTestKey", "MyTestKey\Key2", and "MyTestKey\Key2\Key3". 有效的根名称包含 HKEY_CURRENT_USER、 HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE、 注册表、 HKEY_USERS、 HKEY_PERFORMANCE_DATA、 HKEY_CURRENT_CONFIG 和 HKEY_DYN_DATA。Valid root names include HKEY_CURRENT_USER, HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE, HKEY_CLASSES_ROOT, HKEY_USERS, HKEY_PERFORMANCE_DATA, HKEY_CURRENT_CONFIG, and HKEY_DYN_DATA. > [!NOTE] > 方法打开注册表项、 设置的值，并关闭每次调用时的密钥。The method opens a registry key, sets the value, and closes the key each time it is called. 如果你需要修改大量的值，方法可能会提供更好的性能。If you need to modify a large number of values, the method might provide better performance. 类还提供了可用于将访问控制列表 (ACL) 添加到注册表项，以进行检索之前，测试值的数据类型并删除密钥的方法。The class also provides methods that allow you to add an access control list (ACL) to a registry key, to test the data type of a value before retrieving it, and to delete keys. 如果指定的类型`value`不匹配指定`valueKind`，和数据不能转换，引发。If the type of the specified `value` does not match the specified `valueKind`, and the data cannot be converted, is thrown. 例如，你可以存储作为，但仅当其值为的最大值小于。For example, you can store a as a , but only if its value is less than the maximum value of a . 无法将值存储在单个字符串作为。You cannot store a single string value as a . > [!NOTE] > 如果已装箱的值传递或，完成转换后使用固定区域性。If boxed values are passed for or , the conversion is done using the invariant culture. > [!NOTE] > 在 Windows 98 和 Windows Millennium Edition (Windows Me)，注册表不是 Unicode，并不是所有 Unicode 字符都是有效的所有代码页。On Windows 98 and Windows Millennium Edition (Windows Me), the registry is not Unicode, and not all Unicode characters are valid for all code pages. 对于当前的代码页无效的 Unicode 字符都替换为最佳的匹配项。A Unicode character that is invalid for the current code page is replaced by the best available match. 不引发异常。No exception is thrown. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将多个数据类型的值存储在一个示例键中创建密钥，这样做了，以及然后检索和显示的值。The following code example stores values of several data types in an example key, creating the key as it does so, and then retrieves and displays the values. 示例演示了存储和检索默认 （无名称） 的名称/值对，以及如何使用`defaultValue`名称/值对不存在时。The example demonstrates storing and retrieving the default (nameless) name/value pair, and the use of `defaultValue` when a name/value pair does not exist. [!code-cpp[Microsoft.Win32.Registry.GetSet#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Microsoft.Win32.Registry.GetSet/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Microsoft.Win32.Registry.GetSet#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Microsoft.Win32.Registry.GetSet/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Microsoft.Win32.Registry.GetSet#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Microsoft.Win32.Registry.GetSet/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: Contains information about the default user configuration.

span.span: Contains information about the default user configuration.

summary.span: This field reads the Windows registry base key HKEY_USERS.

span.span: This field reads the Windows registry base key HKEY_USERS.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此项包含计算机的每个用户一个分支。This key contains a branch for each user of the computer. 如果用户未更改首选项，默认配置被提供对本地计算机上的新用户和默认当前用户。The default configuration is supplied for new users on the local computer and for the default current user if the user has not changed preferences. 因为 Windows 98 / 我还支持 Registry.Users，应用程序可以访问特定于用户的信息在 Windows 2000 下的相同方式。Because Windows 98/ME also supports Registry.Users, applications can access the user-specific information the same way they do under Windows 2000. 每个用户的信息存储在单独的文件，可以将存储在本地或网络服务器上。Each user's information is stored in a separate file, which can be stored locally or on a network server. Windows 98 / 我可以将此文件复制到用户的当前系统，以便设置可以从一台计算机之间移动与该用户。Windows 98/ME can copy this file to the user's current system so that settings can move from one computer to another with the user. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何检索此项的子项，并输出到屏幕其名称。The following example demonstrates how to retrieve the subkeys of this key, and prints their names to the screen. 使用方法来创建感兴趣的特定子项的实例。Use the method to create an instance of the particular subkey of interest. 然后，可以使用中的其他操作来操作该注册表项。You can then use other operations in to manipulate that key. [!code-cpp[Classic Registry.Users Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Registry.Users Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic Registry.Users Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Registry.Users Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Registry.Users Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Registry.Users Example/VB/source.vb#1)]
